title: Sooo there's this guy....
body:
There's this guy I really really really really like and I think he might sort of like me back but the only problem is that he goes online and pretends he's a girl. How do I deal with this? (Legit question)

UPDATE:
I don't like him anymore

replies.body: Plot twist: OP is talking about them-self...
wot
He's gay or bisexual and wants male roleplay
True
He sounds weird and kinda like a douche, my advice forgo your feelings and find someone worth your time
he sounds like a loser.
He is a loser fgt with shit taste in music :^)
give examples of the music he likes? probs smth like taylor swift or 1 direction HEHE

No... Worse. :(
Stuff by like Kanye West and Kid Cudi. Ugh ew
And you ***haven't*** condemned them to the bowels of hell?

> [{quoted}](name=Arclight Vayne,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=EAPFtuBx,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-06-02T07:45:29.660+0000)
>
> he sounds like a loser.

Rude.
Tell him to quit it and see how he responds. That shit is creepy he needs to stop.
I've tried. And he will get angry... One time I told someone that he was a guy, and he was like "Wow.. I just lost a client. That dude gifted me 3 skins and now he knows the truth"

> [{quoted}](name=DianasGotSwag,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=EAPFtuBx,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-06-02T08:13:44.411+0000)
>
> Tell him to quit it and see how he responds. That shit is creepy he needs to stop.

Its not that creep (imo) unless he is doing weird shit, he probs just wants rp LEL
its cuz girls get treated better in this game?

A lot of guys play the girl persona online or in game, even though they still identify themselves to be male through and through, it's not uncommon.

Much like how generally when guys post anime gifs, they tend to use gifs that involve girls in there instead of the other gifs of the exact same expression but with guys in it (other than anime gifs people use animals').

Although I don't major in psychology and whatnot, so I don't know the reason, but I can say that this is pretty normal.

Hell even Da'vinci would agree with me, considering Mona Lisa is actually a portrait for both another girl and himself, if I am not wrong (but this is more of a speculation however).

> [{quoted}](name=SEKAI,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=EAPFtuBx,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-06-02T08:16:33.178+0000)
>
> A lot of guys play the girl persona online or in game, it's not uncommon.
> 
> Much like how generally when guys post anime gifs, they tend to use gifs that involve girls in there instead of the other gifs with the exact same expression that has guys in it.
> 
> Although I don't major in psychology and whatnot but I can say that this is pretty normal.
> 
> Hell even Da'vinci would agree with me, considering Mona Lisa is actually both another girl and his own portrait, if I am not wrong.

^^ Damn straight
Act like a guy online with him. but ac`t as a couple kek

Omg! Nice idea; Thanks ShuffledPancake :) 
Only problem is... My IGN does not make me sound like a man.
